DOC.brief_summary: At Bispebjerg Hospital introduce Early Warning Score base triage system , call Bispebjerg Early Warning Score ( BEWS ) , order identify critically ill patient arrival emergency department . The purpose study validate triage system .
DOC.brief_title: Validation Early Warning Score Based Triage System Emergency Department
DOC.criteria: `` Red '' patient Seen emergency department 1. april 2009 30. september 2009
